WorkItem.Description:
There is a bug when selecting multiple chapters for download.
The program will keep re-download the first chapter in the que. (The page count keeps going up like 34/20)
The next chapters are not downloaded at all (stay at "WAITING" indefinitely)

But if I select chapter then click download one-by-one, the queuing works OK.

And "ZIPPING" should be "ZIPPED" to make it more understandable.

Thank you for your program.
